get.description: Site represents a physical location or facility where equipment is installed, or operations are conducted. This can include manufacturing plants or offices.
Site represents a physical location or facility where equipment is installed, or operations are conducted. This can include manufacturing plants or offices.

Organization endpoint provides access to information about organizations, including their names, contact information, and structures. It is a top-level entity in the system, available for systems that support a multi-organizational structure.
 <details>
   <summary>Filtering</summary>

     * filter[name]=HelloFromMakiniAPI
     * filter[name:contains]=Makini
     * filter[name:startsWith]=Hello
     * filter[name:startsWith]=API

     * filter[createdAt:gteq]=2023-11-07
     * filter[createdAt:lt]=2023-11-07
     * filter[createdAt:lted]=2023-11-07

 </details>
 <details>
   <summary>Filter matching</summary>

     * filterMatch=any // OR
     * filterMatch=all // AND

 </details>
 <details>
   <summary>Sorting</summary>

     * sort[createdAt]=1 // DESC
     * sort[createdAt]=0 // ASC

 </details>

Organization endpoint provides access to information about organizations, including their names, contact information, and structures. It is a top-level entity in the system, available for systems that support a multi-organizational structure.

Location is a specific subdivision within a site where equipment or material stock is located. For example, a particular machine may be situated in a specific area within a manufacturing plant, or materials can be stored in a specific warehouse.

The item available for sale could be either physical or digital, offered either at a fixed price or as a subscription service.
